mapper.sql: ID, CHECK_ID, CHECK_JNUM, CHECK_NAME, CHECKED_JNUM, CHECKED_NAME, POINTS, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select: select sum(t.points)/count(1) "perPoint",t.checked_jnum "jnum",t.checked_name "userName" from cs_user_checking t where check_id = ${checkId} group by t.checked_jnum,t.checked_name

select a.jnum "jnum",a.user_name "userName", nvl(b.points,0) "points" from cs_users a left join cs_user_checking b on a.jnum = b.checked_jnum and b.check_id = ${checkId} and b.check_jnum = '${jnum}' where a.position > 10 and a.state = 1 order by a.ord

select jnum "jnum",user_name "userName" from cs_users where jnum not in ( select check_jnum from cs_user_checking where check_id = ${checkId} group by check_jnum,check_name) and (position >= 10 or position = 4)
